scripts.build-js: npm run build-schemes && uglifyjs build/schemes.js js/arc.js js/bar.js js/gauges.js js/header.js js/line.js js/scatter.js js/icon.js --source-map build/index.min.js.map --source-map-root ../ --source-map-url index.min.js.map --output ./build/index.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-json-importer/dist/node-sass-json-importer.js --include-path ./node_modules/boostrap/scss/ --watch --source-map build --output-style compressed --output ./build/ --precision 8 stylesheets/main.scss
